Title: Sweet November
Writer: Herman Raucher, Paul Yurick (story), Kurt Voelker (story), Kurt Voelker (screenplay)
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Charlize Theron, Jason Isaacs, Greg Germann
Plot: A workaholic executive, and an unconventional woman agree to a personal relationship for a short period. In this short period she changes his life.
Production: 3 Arts Entertainment, Bel Air Entertainment, Warner Brothers
